title: Cute Font From a Logo
content:
Hello!

I was hoping someone could help me figure what font is used in my clients logo.

Thank you!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111222213838im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cantas%20Logo_4605.jpg)
author: cgarceau

comments.content:
Seems similar to [Inflex](http://web.archive.org/web/20111222213838/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/inflex/), but the serifs look lighter, and the C counter is different. Others similar: Didoni, Annlie, and some Bodonis that have single C serif.

- Mike Yanega

Other similars: Matthew Carter's [Big Figgins/Elephant](http://web.archive.org/web/20111222213838/http:/www.designmuseum.org/__entry/4986?style=design_image_popup), [ITC Modern no 216](http://web.archive.org/web/20111222213838/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/modern-no-216/)...

I agree with Ryuk. I believe it is 'Elephant'.

----------------------------------  
funkycoldsabrina  
Font Fanatic....Slightly Obsessed.

[Stamp Your Favorite Font On Any Product You Can Imagine.](http://web.archive.org/web/20111222213838/http:/www.absorbentprinting.com/)
See Christian I told you the peeps at Typophile would help!
